pages.text: $(#630000)The Bleeding Tome is a utility item used in a $(l:blocks/hi_enchanting_table)Hijacked Enchanting Table$()$(#630000) to save enchantments from chunks.

$(#630000)Place it in the table's book slot to save the enchantments. Once it is saved, any table it is placed in will be able to apply those enchantments instead. The book doesn't have durability, so once you save you get to keep it forever!
$(#630000)The book can be reset in a crafting grid, allowing it to save a new set of enchantments.
